mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(id, qboard_class, qboard_title, qboard_content,qboard_openchk) VALUES(#{id},#{qboard_class},#{qboard_title},#{qboard_content},#{qboard_openchk})
INSERT INTO hbphoto(board_num, board_class, ori_photo_name, new_photo_name) VALUES(#{param1},#{param2},#{param3},#{param4})
